definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: But sometimes, ISP's and mail service businesses have no interest in righting what went wrong.
sentences.chinese: 但有时，互联网的业务和邮件服务没有兴趣纠正想歪。

sentences.english: Virus-infected emails struck fear into the Microsoft Company.
sentences.chinese: 携带病毒的电子邮件引起了微软公司的恐慌。

sentences.english: Using this function, we can get more representational eigenvector from email.
sentences.chinese: 利用此函数可提取到更具有代表性的邮件特征向量。

sentences.english: I do my e-mail on a 20-inch liquid crystal display (LCD) monitor.
sentences.chinese: 现在我在20英寸的液晶显示器上发电子邮件。

sentences.english: The ability to create his profile to chat with other users via internal mail.
sentences.chinese: 能够创建了其专页聊天，通过内部邮件的用户。

sentences.english: Or the time I sent that late night email to my ex-girlfriend that we should get back together.
sentences.chinese: 或者我在深夜给前女友发邮件，希望我们能重修旧好。

sentences.english: Black Email is spacing out in the corner, contemplating an alternative life in Nara City.
sentences.chinese: 黑邮件在角落里发呆，想着奈良城的别有洞天。

sentences.english: Turn off the notification function on your email program.
sentences.chinese: 关掉电子邮件程序的自动通知功能。

sentences.english: Tell no one, she says to him in her note, they are watching.
sentences.chinese: 她在邮件里说，别告诉任何人，他们正在监视你。

sentences.english: And I'm worried about e-mail! Talk about pricking my pomposity.
sentences.chinese: 用电子邮件不行吗，谈论一下对我自大的打击。
请把这个通知用电子邮件发给各位经理。

sentences.english: Do something other than check your email when you wake.
sentences.chinese: 醒来时随便做点什么，但不要去翻看你的电子邮件。

sentences.english: Are you getting a dozen email newsletters delivered to your inbox on a daily or weekly basis?
sentences.chinese: 每日或每周时事资讯邮件？

sentences.english: Unable to send test Message. Please verify the E-mail Address field.
sentences.chinese: 无法发送测试消息，请检查“电子邮件地址”字段。

sentences.english: E-mail addresses can have several forms, even though there is a standard format.
sentences.chinese: 电子邮件地址有多种格式，但是有一种标准格式。

sentences.english: After getting new email: waste 10 minutes aimlessly surfing the web.
sentences.chinese: 漫无目的的上上网，在收到一封信邮件后。

definition: email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
